description:
Midweight socks with lots of cushion, designed to wear with hiking boots for long days on the trail. The Midweight Microcrew Hiker's quick-drying and breathable fabric keeps your feet warm in the winter and cool in the summer, and stands up to the rigours of thru-hiking.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon and spandex
  • High-density cushioning in the foot base ensures the sock is super comfy and durable
  • Ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Hiker Midweight  with Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Unisex
